title: Mini Cart Application
description: This Mini Cart Application is a sleek e-commerce cart system built using React and React Router. It allows users to browse products, add items to their cart, and view the total price dynamically—all within a clean, responsive interface.
features: Home page with products from FakeStoreAPI
Cart page with dynamic total price
Context API and useReducer for state
concepts: Context API: Centralized store for managing cart items and total price.
Dynamic Routing: Seamless navigation using react-router.
API Integration: Pulls product data dynamically.
Tailwind CSS: Provides a clean, modern UI.
improvements: UI feedback with animations or toasts
